subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias, Dainius Zubrus and Ryan Carter scored in a span of 8 minutes 25 seconds in the opening period, and Martin Brodeur became just the second goalie to reach triple figures in playoff wins.
snippet: Patrik Elias, Dainius Zubrus and Ryan Carter scored in a span of 8 minutes 25 seconds in the opening period, and Martin Brodeur became just the second goalie to reach triple figures in playoff wins.
